name: Zelda- Ticking Pressure
description:
Ganon has the bomb rod and has infested the castle with weirdly behaving moblins! hes going to explode hyrule castle and inturn all of hyrule! Save the kingdom from this devastating blow. is it truly ganon?

Controls (also in game) {

arrow keys: move link

z key: accept/item/talk

x key: cancel/attack

enter: open menu

Credits:

Nightmare theme : Nintendo

There are lots of bugs, but i'll iron them out after the jam. sfx arent implemented yet as well.

the shop and link's house are not available yet.

Known Bugs: hookshot rooms in hyrule castle can softlock, boomerang can sometimes stay in place, enemies go into solids, nightmare may have the wrong death sprite.

fixed bugs v0.2: nightmare bug fixed, misplaced tile in hookshot room1 fixed, lag from awful music code during link's fall fixed.

potential bugs: camera might bug out rarely.
